page.title: 12Cockermouth show
page.content: The Cockermouth Agricultural show is an annual event held on a day in late July. Farmers from as far away as Southern Scotland and the Pennines come to show their milk and beef cattle and sheep. There are show jumping competitions. Horses are also shown in the rings, they range from the great Clydesdales to the small Shetland ponies and their foals. There are many items which are entered in the'Industrial Section' which is for home produce and craft work for people of all ages. Hound Trailing, a popular Lake District sport, takes place in the afternoon. A fair is open all day for the young children.
